Metadata.title: Holiday Apartment Eggers
Metadata.description: Modern holiday apartment in Cuxhaven Sahlenburg with space for up to 6 guests. Quiet location, about 1000 meters to the Wadden Sea beach. Dog-friendly and largely barrier-free.

Hero.headline: Peace. Nature. North Sea.
Hero.subheadline: Your private retreat in Cuxhaven-Sahlenburg. 62 m² of relaxation, just 1000m from the UNESCO World Heritage Wadden Sea.

review1.name: Sabine M.
review1.text: A beautiful apartment! The tranquility in Sahlenburg is wonderful and the walk to the beach is lovely. We especially loved that our dog was so welcome.

review2.name: Michael K.
review2.text: Top-notch amenities, nothing was missing. The terrace is great for breakfast. The accessibility is also very well done. We'll definitely be back!

review3.name: Weber Family
review3.text: Very clean and cozily furnished. The contact with the Eggers family was completely uncomplicated and warm. Value for money is absolutely fair for Cuxhaven.

meta.title: Amenities
meta.description: Complete amenities of the Eggers Holiday Apartment: living area, two bedrooms, modern kitchen, bathroom and terrace. Largely barrier-free.

hero.headline: Amenities
hero.text: Feel at home. Our 62 m² holiday apartment offers you all the comfort you need for a relaxing vacation on the North Sea.

items.windows: Bright, friendly atmosphere with large windows

accessibility.title: Accessibility Information
accessibility.text: The Eggers Holiday Apartment is largely barrier-free designed. Access to the apartment is at ground level without steps. The doors are wide enough for walkers and wheelchairs. The bathroom has a walk-in shower.
accessibility.notice: Note: The second bedroom is not barrier-free accessible due to the room layout.

hero.headline: Location & Surroundings
hero.text: Between forest, mudflats and heath. Enjoy the tranquility in Sahlenburg and the proximity to the UNESCO World Heritage Wadden Sea.

discover.headline: Discover Sahlenburg
discover.text1: Sahlenburg is the only Cuxhaven spa district that directly connects forest, heath and the Wadden Sea. Here you'll find pure relaxation in a unique natural landscape.
discover.text2: Our holiday apartment is located at Nordheimstraße 150, a quiet residential area. From here you can reach the beach and the Wadden Sea in just a few minutes – perfect for long walks or a relaxing beach day.

map.title: Map: Eggers Holiday Apartment, Nordheimstraße 150, Cuxhaven-Sahlenburg

byCar.title: By Car
byCar.text: Via the A27 to Cuxhaven, then follow the signs towards Sahlenburg. Your personal parking space is right at the house.

byTrain.title: By Train
byTrain.text: To Cuxhaven train station. From there by bus (line 1004) directly to Sahlenburg or comfortably by taxi (approx. 15 min ride).
byTrain.tip: Tip: We're happy to help organize a taxi.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Meet the Eggers family – your hosts in Cuxhaven-Sahlenburg. Personal care and attention to detail for many years.

hero.headline: About Us
hero.text: Welcome! We are the Eggers family and we look forward to welcoming you to our holiday apartment in Cuxhaven-Sahlenburg.

story.headline: Welcome to the Eggers Family
story.text1: The love for the North Sea has been with our family for generations. When we got the opportunity to set up a holiday apartment in Sahlenburg a few years ago, it was immediately clear to us: This is where we want to create a place of relaxation for others.
story.text2: What started as a small project quickly became a matter of the heart. With great attention to detail, we designed every room – always with the thought of what we ourselves would want on vacation: coziness, comfort, and the perfect mix of tranquility and adventure.
story.text3: Today, we're delighted about every guest who arrives and discovers the unique atmosphere of Sahlenburg. Whether mudflat hiking, walks through the Wernerwald forest, or simply relaxing on the terrace – we wish you unforgettable moments.

portrait.title: The Eggers Family
portrait.subtitle: Your hosts in Sahlenburg
portrait.quote: "We want you to feel at home with us – just with a better view of the North Sea."

local.description: As locals, we love to share our insider tips for the most beautiful places in Sahlenburg and the surrounding area.

cta.headline: Any Questions?

hero.headline: Privacy Policy
hero.text: We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. Here you can learn how we process your data.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.text: This privacy policy is a template and must be replaced with a legally reviewed version tailored to your specific data processing before going live.

overview.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance
overview.subtitle: General Information
overview.text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website or use our booking system. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.

responsible.title: 2. Data Controller
responsible.text: The party responsible for data processing on this website is:

contact.title: Contact Form and Booking Inquiries
contact.text: If you send us inquiries via the contact form or booking request, your information from the inquiry form, including the contact data you provide there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and for any follow-up questions.

data.name: Name
data.travel: Travel dates and number of guests

contact.legal: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract initiation)

serverLogs.title: Server Log Files
serverLogs.text: The website provider automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us (e.g., browser type, time, IP address). This data is not merged with other data sources and is deleted after 7 days at the latest.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies
cookies.text: Our website only uses cookies insofar as this is technically necessary (e.g., to save your theme preference [Dark Mode]). These cookies serve exclusively the functionality of the website. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
cookies.legal: Legal basis: Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in technical functionality)

external.title: 5. External Services
external.text: We may use external channel managers or booking platforms (e.g., Booking.com, Airbnb) for managing bookings. In this case, data processing is also carried out by these service providers in accordance with their privacy policies.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights & Contact
rights.text: You have the right at any time to free information about your stored personal data, its origin and recipients, and the purpose of data processing, as well as a right to correction, blocking, or deletion of this data.
